message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for both of us! Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm only able to go up to $10,500 right now.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. How about $10,800? It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find the product worth it at that price.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still stuck at $10,500. That's my final offer. If it doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider other options.

Bob, I understand you're firm on your price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can't go lower than $10,650. It's a small difference, but it means a lot to me.  Let me know if we can make this work.
Alice, I understand your situation, but $10,650 is still a bit too high for me. I'm prepared to walk away at this point. How about we meet in the middle at $10,550? This is my final offer.
